page.title: 05New Houses in Chelmsford
page.content: We went to the eastern side of the busy{A12}to see the brand new homes built by Wimpeys. We discovered that they were not on any existing map. We interviewed the building foreman and he said, " We employ about thirty people who get paid, on average, about Â£100 a week.Some builders can earn double this with overtime.We expect to finish this site in 1987 but some families have moved in already." We spoke to one family,the Tays. They told us they had been there for seven months, having paid Â£39000 for a two- bedroomed house with a garage.In spite of the busy and noisy A12 and the nearby industrial estate, they were pleased with their house and its position.We surveyed the A12 and counted over three hundred southbound vehicles in less than twelve minutes, during the early afternoon.
